tool_description: Categorizes points of interest from location data into business types and activity categories for audience behavior analysis.

location_points.description: Array of location coordinates to categorize

search_radius.description: Search radius in meters for POI matching (10-500)

category_level.description: Categorization granularity: basic, detailed, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid location points: Provide valid coordinate strings with latitude/longitude values.
Search radius out of range: Set search_radius between 10 and 500 meters.
Invalid category level: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive].
Too many location points: Limit location_points array to maximum 5000 items.
usage: Provide location_points array; optionally set search_radius and category_level. The tool returns categorized POIs with confidence scores and business types.

categorized_pois.description: Array of categorized points of interest with business types

category_distribution.description: Distribution of POI categories with counts

uncategorized_count.description: Number of points that could not be categorized

confidence_score.description: Average confidence score for POI categorization
